author: Matt Harvey
title: Update: Wintry conditions slow morning commute; front approaching | WV News | wvnews.com
text:
CLARKSBURG, W.Va. (WV News) — The weather outside is frightful, at least for those in the morning commute.
Sheriff Robert Matheny II is urging drivers to stay alert and follow best practices for winter driving with a big snow front pushing north and expected to hit around 8 a.m.

author: 银柿财经
title: 肯尼亚央行第六次降息，基准利率降至9.75%
text:
6月18日，商务部综合肯尼亚近日报道，肯尼亚中央银行（CBK）连续第六次降息，将基准利率从10%下调至9.75%，为2023年6月以来的最低水平，持续向商业银行施压，要求其降低贷款利率。
　　监管机构观察到，在持续的低通胀和汇率稳定的情况下，有更大的空间来下调政策利率以重振私营部门贷款。尽管一年期国库券等竞争资产类别的回报率已跌破10%，但商业银行平均贷款利率仍维持在高位，4月、5月分别为15.7%、15.4%。
　　肯尼亚央行货币政策委员会（MPC）还将肯尼亚2025年的GDP预期增长率从5.4%下调至5.2%，并将其归因于关税上调影响贸易并对一些关键行业产生连锁反应。

author: 小浪财讯
title: 电信ETF基金（560690）跌0.60%，半日成交额6.00万元|电信_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
6月19日，截止午间收盘，电信ETF基金（560690）跌0.60%，报1.329元，成交额6.00万元。电信ETF基金（560690）重仓股方面， 中国电信 截止午盘跌0.77%， 中国联通 跌1.32%， 中国移动 跌0.21%， 银之杰 跌2.09%， 中国卫通 跌1.78%， 中兴通讯 跌0.57%， 中际旭创 涨3.03%， 新易盛 涨0.13%， 紫光股份 跌0.91%， 中天科技 跌2.17%。
电信ETF基金（560690）业绩比较基准为中证电信主题指数收益率，管理人为鹏华基金管理有限公司，基金经理为罗英宇，成立（2024-04-01）以来回报为33.77%，近一个月回报为3.83%。

author: Mbali Tebele
title: An Old Video of Mbongeni Ngema Blasting ANC Resurfaces on Social Media - Briefly.co.za
text: An Old Video of Mbongeni Ngema Blasting ANC Resurfaces on Social Media - An old clip of the late Mbongeni Ngema resurfaced on social media - The icon is seen on the video shared online, ranting about how the ANC has turned against its people - The star is also heard saying that they are a lost cause and won't be swayed to do the right thing Many [South Africans](https://briefly.co.za/19146-list-famous-south-africans.html) are [mourning the death of a legend](https://briefly.co.za/entertainment/celebrities/176388-lebo-m-mourns-safarina-star-mbongeni-ngemas-untimely-death-touching-post/) and an icon. The late veteran Mbongeni Ngema's old memories have been shared online. Video of Mbongeni bashing the ANC resurfaces The 68-year-old [Sarafina! creator passed away](https://briefly.co.za/entertainment/celebrities/176379-mbongeni-ngema-dies-head-collision-accident-a-funeral-eastern-cape/) on Wednesday, 27 December 2023, in a head-on collision, and after the news of his death was confirmed, many netizens poured in their tributes and condolences. Recently [old clips of the star](https://briefly.co.za/entertainment/celebrities/176392-old-video-mbongeni-ngema-discussing-sarafina-resurfaces/) have resurfaced and shared on social media, and one of those clips was of him bashing the now ANC. In the video, Ngema is heard saying that the political party has turned its back on their [people](https://briefly.co.za/people/) and they could not be swayed to do the right thing for their people. The [@ZANewsFlash](https://twitter.com/ZANewsFlash) posted the clip and wrote: "WATCH: The late Mbongeni Ngema once had this to say about the current ANC. He said "they have turned against their people" and added that they are like a lost cause. They could not be swayed to do the right thing for the people." See the [post](https://twitter.com/zanewsflash/status/1740301708046057752?s=46&t=BX6HfVuaRHZugGlL_Tkaew) below: SA responds to the post See some of the responses below: @SeanDelchaye wrote: "Says the same man who once pocketed 14mil for Sarafina 2 to be a aids awareness musical and it never came to light." @KingNkosana_ said: "They'll insult you those ones." @bigkoostar mentioned: "I argue that there was never any stage where the ANC was for the people.The ANC has always been against their people." @nhlangu1 responded: "This guy is the reason we have Lady Smith Black Mambazo. His journey to Philadelphia & back to Lamontville & meeting with OR Tambo to make it Possible for Amambazo." @diplomatl wrote: "He wasn’t wrong. May His Revolutionary Soul Rest In Power." @FreeGeneraxion mentioned: "Anyone who pretend to want to revive the anc is the enemy of the people." Minister Zizi Kodwa reacts to Dr Mbongeni Ngema's death In more [entertainment](https://briefly.co.za/entertainment/) news, Briefly News reported South Africa's Minister of Sports, Arts and Culture, Zizi Kodwa, has taken to social media to [mourn Mbongeni Ngema's untimely death](https://briefly.co.za/entertainment/celebrities/176385-minister-zizi-kodwa-reacts-dr-mbongeni-ngemas-death-sas-great-playwrights/). The SA entertainment industry has suffered another great loss days after singer Bulelwa "Zahara" Mkutukana's death. Mbongeni Ngema's untimely death has left the industry and fans reeling. PAY ATTENTION: Сheck out news that is picked exactly for YOU - click on [“Recommended for you”](https://briefly.co.za/recommended/) and enjoy! Source: Briefly News

author: @Nhan Dan Online
title: Grand military parade commemorates 70th anniversary of Dien Bien Phu Victory | Nhan Dan Online
text: Party General Secretary Nguyen Phu Trong sent a flower basket to celebrate the anniversary. The event was attended by former General Secretary Nong Duc Manh; Former Presidents: Nguyen Minh Triet, Truong Tan Sang, Nguyen Xuan Phuc; Prime Minister Pham Minh Chinh; Former Prime Minister Nguyen Tan Dung; former Chairman of the National Assembly (NA) Nguyen Van An; Acting President Vo Thi Anh Xuan; Politburo members: Permanent member of the Party Central Committee (PCC)’s Secretariat and Head of the PCC's Organisation Commission Truong Thi Mai, Standing Vice Chairman of the NA Tran Thanh Man, Secretary of the PCC and Head of PCC's Commission for Internal Affairs Phan Dinh Trac, Secretary of the PCC and Chief Justice of the Supreme People's Court Nguyen Hoa Binh, Minister of Public Security General To Lam, Minister of National Defence General Phan Van Giang, Secretary of Hanoi Municipal Party Committee Dinh Tien Dung, and Secretary of Ho Chi Minh City Party Committee Nguyen Van Nen. The ceremony also drew the participation of other Secretaries of the PCC, leaders of central ministries and agencies and some provinces and cities, revolutionary veterans, heroic Vietnamese mothers, Dien Bien soldiers, frontline workers and youth volunteers who participated in the Dien Bien Phu Campaign. The government delegations from Lao, Cambodia, China, and France as well as ambassadors and representatives of international organisations in Vietnam also attended the event.

author: Tech Desk
title: Meta's CEO Allegedly Approved the Use of Pirated Books to Train AI Systems, Authors Claim
text:
A group of authors, including Ta-Nehisi Coates and comedian Sarah Silverman, have accused [Meta](https://www.techjuice.pk/metas-u-s-fact-checking-program-replaced-by-community-based-notes/) Platforms of using pirated versions of copyrighted books to train its artificial intelligence systems.
The authors, who are suing the company for copyright infringement, claim that internal documents revealed during the discovery process show that Meta knew the works were pirated, with approval from CEO Mark Zuckerberg.
Reuters reported that these accusations were made public in documents filed with a federal court in California on Wednesday. The writers filed a lawsuit against Meta in 2023, claiming that the tech company had improperly utilized their novels to train [Llama](https://www.techjuice.pk/meta-ceo-mark-zuckerberg-unveils-llama-3-3-ai-model-with-enhanced-efficiency/), its massive language model.
The complaint is one of numerous that claim the development of AI products was done without authorization using copyrighted works by artists, authors, and others. According to the defendants, they used copyrighted content fairly.
The writers requested permission from the court to submit a revised complaint. According to them, further evidence revealed that Meta utilized peer-to-peer torrents to disseminate the AI training dataset LibGen, which purportedly contains millions of copyrighted works.
They said internal Meta communications showed Zuckerberg “approved Meta’s use of the LibGen dataset notwithstanding concerns within Meta’s AI executive team that LibGen is ‘a dataset we know to be pirated.'”
Last year, U.S. District Judge Vince Chhabria rejected allegations that Meta illegally removed the copyright management information (CMI) from the authors’ works and that content produced by Meta’s chatbots violated their copyrights.
The authors also stated that the evidence supported their accusations of infringement and supported the addition of a new computer fraud claim in addition to the revival of the existing CMI suit.
However, Chhabria stated that he would permit the writers to submit an amended complaint but voiced doubts regarding the validity of fraud and CMI claims.

author: Brenda Martínez
title: ¡Calor deja este cuerpo trabajador! Prevén hasta 33 grados en 10 alcaldías de la CDMX este viernes
text:
La Secretaría de Gestión Integral de Riesgos y Protección Civil ( SGIRPC ) de la Ciudad de México informó que se espera que el calor alcance desde 31 y hasta 33 grados Celsius este viernes 23 de marzo por lo que se activó la Alerta Naranja en 10 alcaldías. Además, se pide a la población tomar en cuenta las siguientes recomendaciones :
Usar bloqueador solar Procurar no exponerse al sol por un tiempo prolongado No realizar actividades intensas bajo el rayo del sol Evita comer en la vía pública, ya que los alimentos se descomponen rápidamente Lee también ¿Otra? Ahora reportan falla en escaleras eléctricas de la Línea 3 del Metro
Lista de alcaldías de la CDMX con Alerta Naranja por altas temperaturas Azcapotzalco Benito Juárez Coyoacán Gustavo A. Madero Iztacalco Iztapalapa Miguel Hidalgo Tlalpan Venustiano Carranza Lee también 5 maneras de mantenerse hidratado en época de calor
Se activa Alerta Naranja por pronóstico de Temperaturas Altas para la tarde de mañana viernes 22/03/2024 en las demarcaciones de @AzcapotzalcoMx , @BJAlcaldia , @Alcaldia_Coy , @AlcCuauhtemocMx , @TuAlcaldiaGAM , @IztacalcoAl , @Alc_Iztapalapa , @AlcaldiaMHmx , @TlalpanAl y @A_VCarranza .… pic.twitter.com/k3lMugS7PS
— Secretaría de Gestión Integral de Riesgos y PC (@SGIRPC_CDMX) March 21, 2024 México firma convenio con gobierno de Maduro para retornar venezolanos y apoyarlos con 110 dólares al mes

author: Get News
title: The Data Group Expands Services with New API Offerings to Enhance Customer Identification and Verification | User | theeveningleader.com
text:
Enhancing Data Accuracy and Efficiency in Customer Identification and Verification Orlando, FL - The Data Group, a leader in data quality solutions, is excited to announce the expansion of its services with the introduction of new API offerings, further enriching its Caller ID API capabilities. These new services are designed to empower businesses with comprehensive tools for customer identification, verification, and data enhancement, ensuring better data quality and improved marketing success.
Introducing New API Services:
- Phone Append API: Enhance customer records with up-to-date phone numbers.
- Email Append API: Complete customer profiles with verified email addresses.
- ID Verify API: Strengthen security with real-time identity verification
- Email Verification API: Ensure the accuracy of email data with instant verification.
- Email Lookup API: Retrieve detailed information associated with email addresses.
- Phone Lookup API: Access comprehensive data behind any phone number.
- Digital Onboarding API: Streamline customer onboarding processes digitally.
- Digital Reach API: Broadens customer reach with enhanced digital profiling.
- Demographic Append API: Augments customer files with demographic details.
- TCPA API: Helps companies adhere to Telephone Consumer Protection Act guidelines.
The Data Group's API services allows businesses to discover customer names, addresses, emails, and more using just a phone number, starting at an affordable rate of $0.02 per lookup. With an industry-leading 55% match rate, it offers the lowest prices without compromising on data quality. The API enables real-time identification, ensuring accurate and efficient customer interaction and data management.
The API suite from The Data Group is more than just a set of tools; it's a catalyst for transformative change in how businesses manage and utilize customer data. These APIs are engineered to provide comprehensive solutions that address the ever-evolving needs of modern enterprises, ensuring that customer information is not only accurate but also actionable. With these enhancements, companies can expect:
These new API services are available now for businesses of all sizes, from startups to Fortune 1000 companies. Interested parties can request a free match report to experience the quality and accuracy of The Data Group's data solutions firsthand.
By integrating The Data Group’s new APIs into their systems, businesses can leverage these benefits to not only enhance their operational efficiency but also gain a competitive edge in their respective markets.
For more information about The Data Group and its new API services, please visit our website or contact our sales team.
Caller ID API Service: https://thedatagroup.com/caller-id-api/
About The Data Group
The Data Group is dedicated to overcoming the challenges of inaccurate and incomplete customer data. By providing industry-leading data solutions, The Data Group enhances customer interactions and boosts marketing success. "Better Data, Better Results" is not just our motto; it’s our commitment to our clients, ensuring they receive superior quality data and service that is efficient, affordable, and easy to implement.
Businesses utilizing The Data Group's services have experienced significant improvements in customer data accuracy, operational efficiency, and marketing effectiveness. Testimonials and success stories are available, highlighting the transformative impact of our solutions.
